thread.title: Trump on Twitter: ruling against the US travel ban "is ridiculous and will be overturned" — RT News
thread.title_full: Trump on Twitter: ruling against the US travel ban "is ridiculous and will be overturned" — RT News

title: Trump on Twitter: ruling against the US travel ban "is ridiculous and will be overturned" — RT News
text:
Trump on Twitter: ruling against the US travel ban "is ridiculous and will be overturned" Published time: 4 Feb, 2017 13:27 Edited time: 4 Feb, 2017 13:34 Get short URL US President Donald Trump has responded to a federal judge’s block of his administration's travel ban on seven predominantly Muslim countries, tweeting that the decision "is ridiculous and will be overturned.” The opinion of this so-called judge, which essentially takes law-enforcement away from our country, is ridiculous and will be overturned! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 4, 2017 
DETAILS TO FOLLOW
